title: AEP Lakehouse Content
description: Global schema for AEP Lakehouse Volumes

xdm:path.title: Path
xdm:path.description: Logical location of the file relative to the Volume root (Primary Key)

xdm:absolutePath.title: AbsolutePath
xdm:absolutePath.description: Location of the file in absolute terms, including the storage provider prefix.

xdm:createTime.title: Create Time
xdm:createTime.description: The date and time when this file was created.

xdm:modificationTime.title: ModificationTime
xdm:modificationTime.description: The date and time when this file was last modified.

xdm:tags.title: Tags
xdm:tags.description: Key value pairs set on the files in cloud storage.

xdm:webUrl.title: WebURL
xdm:webUrl.description: Optional url from where this content is located.
